alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:29PM AKDT until July 24 at 2:45PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM AKDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MIDDLE TANANA VALLEY AND SOUTHWESTERN YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... At 228 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 40 miles northwest of Cleary Summit, or 44 miles north of Moose Mountain Ski Area, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Middle Tanana Valley and southwestern Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Tanana Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands
